duties_responsibilities.duty: Operate the light board for the nightly show, including programming and maintenance.
Generate and update lighting paperwork, inventory, and schedules.
Collaborate with Designer, Director, and Stage Manager on logistics and lighting needs.
Handle lighting rentals, ordering, and electrical prop repairs if needed.
Perform all manipulation of lighting equipment, including focus, cleaning, and safety checks.
Maintain a weekly maintenance schedule, ensure company safety guidelines are followed, and keep the lighting booth clean and organized.
Train the lighting sub and promote a positive team atmosphere onsite.
Attend rehearsals and weekly production meetings as requested.
